item.title: From TimSort to pdqsort: Engineering Optimizations in Production Sorting
item.description: Textbook quicksort is just the starting point. Real-world sorting algorithms have undergone decades of engineering optimization. This post deep-dives into Python’s TimSort and Go/Rust’s pdqsort, revealing the gap between “industrial-grade” and “textbook-grade”.
